roleset.name: printing text too small to be seen by the naked eye
roleset.note: MICROPRINTING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from microprinting.01-n)

example.name: arg1, 2
example.text: A method deterring counterfeiting of a document, the method comprising: microprinting a first pattern of microprint on the document; and microprinting a second pattern of microprint on the document, wherein the first pattern of microprint and the second pattern of microprint are not substantially reproducible via a digital imaging device.
